name: Rinnaicontrol•r20
0:
”Alexa, Tell control r I need hot water”
”Alexa, Ask control r for hot water”
”Alexa, Ask control r to give me hot water”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: control r.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Tired of waiting for your hot water? Use this Alexa skill to start your Rinnai Tankless Water Heater's recirculation system for faster hot water. Imagine how much water is wasted down the drain while you wait for your shower to warm up every day. Well, wait no more! 

If you have the Rinnai control•r 2.0 app, you may take advantage of this Alexa skill. Not sure if you have a compatible app or tankless model? Visit rinnai.us to look up your model number or contact Rinnai's Customer Care at 800-621-9419.

*Requires Rinnai's control•r™ accessory for connectivity
